rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, Turtle-chan, Saika,
do you have a minute?

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0002
rows.name:
What's the matter? It's pretty
rare for you to start a serious
conversation, Nia.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0003
rows.name: Well, it's about Kamekichi...

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0004
rows.name: Kamekichi?!

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0005
kizunatalk040_msg0006
rows.name:
Yeah, but I suppose we could
let you pet his head a bit.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0007
rows.name: Uh-huh.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0008
rows.name:
Judging by your responses, you
clearly haven't figured it out...

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0009
rows.name:
The truth is, Kamekichi has been
sneaking into my bed every night.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0010
rows.name: W-what?! Are you serious?!

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0011
rows.name:
I'm terrified I might squish
him while I'm sleeping. I
can't get any decent rest.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0012
rows.name:
He's your idol, right? I thought
you'd be angry if I injured him.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0013
rows.name: So I've been sleep-deprived recently.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0014
rows.name:
Well, sorry that our Kamekichi
has been causing you trouble.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0015
rows.name:
Prince, why aren't you properly
watching over Kamekichi?

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0016
rows.name:
Hahaha! Once I get into bed, I
fall into a deep sleep instantly!

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0017
rows.name: Hmmm...

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0018
rows.name:
We definitely need to figure
out a solution here.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0019
rows.name: What should we do?

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0020
rows.name: Maybe he could sleep in my bed instead?

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0021
rows.name:
Let's flip this whole
issue on its head.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0101
rows.name:
You're right. That might be the
best solution for nighttime.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0102
rows.name:
He used to sleep in my bed anyway,
so I'm sure it'll be fine.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0103
rows.name:
Well, that's a relief. Thanks
for handling this, Saika.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0104
rows.name: Yeah, leave it to me.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0105
rows.name:
By the way, you mentioned earlie
that he used to sleep with Saika,
but how long have you had Kamekichi?

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0106
rows.name:
Not as long as the Prince and
I have been together, but
still quite a while, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0107
rows.name:
Huh, despite that, he
hasn't grown at all.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0108
rows.name:
What would you do if
Kamekichi grew to be as
big as Byakko, Turtle-chan?

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0109
rows.name:
That's such a ridiculous
thing to imagine.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0110
rows.name: Shut up.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0111
rows.name:
I certainly couldn't hold
him in my palm anymore...

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0112
rows.name:
Right? I was wondering if
you'd still travel together
if that happened.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0113
rows.name:
How about the reverse... I could
ride on Kamekichi instead!

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0114
rows.name: You mean, like Nia and Byakko?

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0115
rows.name: Exactly! Wouldn't that look awesome?

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0116
rows.name:
No, it wouldn't be cool! And
he'd probably be really slow!

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0117
rows.name: You're probably right...

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0118
rows.name: Fair point.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0119
rows.name: I hope Kamekichi stays small forever...

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0201
rows.name: Flip it?

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0202
rows.name: On its head?

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0203
rows.name: Yep.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0204
rows.name:
Kamekichi is a full-fledged member
of our team too, isn't he?

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0205
rows.name:
I don't think he should forever be
just our and the Prince's idol.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0206
rows.name:
I think he's a companion to Rex,
Tora, Meleph, and you too, Nia.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0207
rows.name:
So, how about we all take
care of Kamekichi together?

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0208
rows.name: Oh! That's a great idea!

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0209
rows.name:
See? That way, there's
nothing weird about him
sleeping in Nia's bed either.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0210
rows.name:
No, no, that's the same as me
taking care of him alone.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0211
rows.name:
This doesn't fix my
lack of sleep at all.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0212
rows.name:
Then, how about having
Byakko look after him?

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0213
rows.name:
He's nice and fluffy, so
he'd make a comfy bed.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0214
rows.name:
If that's the criteria,
Tora would work well too.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0215
rows.name:
He's also soft and fluffy,
would make a nice bed too.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0216
rows.name:
Hold on... Are you two actually
tired of looking after Kamekichi?

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0218
rows.name: T-that's not true! Right, Saika?

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0219
rows.name:
Yeah, that's right. I
sometimes forget about
him, but I really like him.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0220
rows.name:
I'm starting to understand
why Kamekichi sneaks into
my bed at night...
